ParticlesSystem

Class ParticlesSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParticlesSystem.ParticlesSystem

  • public class ParticlesSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    A particles' System is a mechanical 3D system which contains particles.

        Constant Field Values

      • stiffness

        protected double stiffness
        Global stiffness force applied to every particles

      • momentum

        protected double momentum
        Global momentum force applied to every particles

      • friction

        protected double friction
        Global friction force applied to every particles

      • threshold

        protected Vector2 threshold
        Global threshold applied to every particles' mouvements. Movements under the min threshold are considered null, and movements over the max threshold are casted.

      • memory

        protected int memory
        Global memory applied to every particles. Memory set how many old particles' position to memorize (history)

      • maxParticles

        protected int maxParticles
        Maximal number of particles allowed in this system

      • recycleParticles

        protected boolean recycleParticles
        Not yet in use

      • particlesToDelete

        protected java.util.List<Particle> particlesToDelete
        Temporary list of particles that have to be delete at next update. Using this list is important to avoid concurrent modification and re-synchronize erase events to each update tick.

      • particles

        protected java.util.List<Particle> particles
        Current list of all particles in this system

      • magnetsSystem

        protected MagnetsSystem magnetsSystem
        Magnets' system

      • blobsSystem

        protected BlobsSystem blobsSystem
        Blobs' system

      • simulation

        protected Particles simulation
        Object responsible for the simulation

      • edgeComportements

        protected int[] edgeComportements
        Define on each window edge which comportement to apply on particles

      • semaphore

        protected java.util.concurrent.Semaphore semaphore
        Prevent concurrent modification is particles' lists

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParticlesSystem

        public ParticlesSystem(Particles simulation,
               MagnetsSystem magnetsSystem,
               BlobsSystem blobsSystem)
        Construct a particles' System
        Parameters:
        simulation - Object responsible for conducting the simulation

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Update the whole particle's System (each particle position). If the semaphore is not free, do nothing. Else, delete every particles in particlesToDelete list and then update each particle position.

      • setParticlePosition

        protected void setParticlePosition(int index,
                       Particle particle)
        Set up in the outMatrix the particle position scaled to Max.GL_...
        Parameters:
        index - Line's index in outFreeMatrix
        particle - Particle to set up position

      • setParticleInitPosition

        protected void setParticleInitPosition(int i,
                           int j,
                           Vector3 initPos)
        Set up in the initMatrix the initial particle position scaled to Max.GL_...
        Parameters:
        i - Column's index of the particle
        j - Line's index of the particle
        initPos - Initial position of the particle scaled by Max.ENGINE_...

      • addForce

        protected void addForce(Particle particle,
            Brush brush,
            Vector3[] mouvement)
        Add some force to the particle if its position intersect the brush
        Parameters:
        particle - Particle on which apply force
        brush - Brush used by blob
        mouvement - Describes the blob's mouvement : {position, delta}

      • delete

        protected void delete(Particle particle,
          Brush brush,
          Vector3[] mouvement)
        Delete the particle is its position intersect the brush. The particle is not directly cleared but added to particlesToDelete list.
        Parameters:
        particle - Particle to delete
        brush - Brush used by blob
        mouvement - Describes the blob's mouvement : {position, delta}

      • addParticles

        public void addParticles(Vector3 position,
                int nbToAdd)
        Add nb particles in the system at the given position
        Parameters:
        position - Position to add particles scaled by Max.ENGINE_...
        nbToAdd - Number of particles to add

      • hasParticles

        public boolean hasParticles()
        Determine if the system has at least one particle
        Returns:
        true if at least one particle exists, false otherwise

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the particle system. Particles will be cleared.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Properly destroy the system

      • setThreshold

        public ParticlesSystem setThreshold(double minThreshold,
                           double maxThreshold)
        Set the threshold
        Parameters:
        minThreshold - New threshold min
        maxThreshold - New threshold max
        Returns:
        The current particle's system

        Returns:

        Returns:

        Set the momentum
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        public void setMaxParticles(int maxParticles)
        Set the maximum of particles
        Parameters:
        maxParticles - New maximum

      • setMemory

        public void setMemory(int memory)
        Set particles' memory
        Parameters:
        memory - New memory

      • getStiffness

        public double getStiffness()
        Getter : stiffness
        Returns:
        La constante de raideur de ressort appliquée aux particules du système.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getMomentum

        public double getMomentum()
        Getter : momentum
        Returns:
        La pondération du moment appliquée aux particules du système. Le moment est un le déplacement aléatoire d'une particule.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getFriction

        public double getFriction()
        Getter : friction
        Returns:
        Pourcentage de frottement appliqué aux déplacements des particules du système. 0% = libre, 100% = immobile
        Since:
        1.0

      • getSeuilMin

        public double getSeuilMin()
        Getter : seuilMin
        Returns:
        Seuil en deça duquel les particules du système seront considérées comme immobiles.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getSeuilMax

        public double getSeuilMax()
        Getter : seuilMax
        Returns:
        Seuil au dessus duquel les particules du système seront limités.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getMemory

        public int getMemory()
        Getter : memory
        Returns:
        Nombre de positions à mémoriser pour le tracé du déplacement des particules libres du système.
        Since:
        1.0

      • loadParticles

        public void loadParticles(com.cycling74.jitter.JitterMatrix jm)
        Load initial's particles positions from a matrix.
        Parameters:
        jm - Matrix of initials positions

      • getEdgePosition

        public double getEdgePosition(int edge,
                     double position)
        Allow to particles to computes theirs new position when they meet an edge
        Parameters:
        edge - Which edge is met (see static members)
        position - Current 1D position (because only one dimension goes through an edge!)
        Returns:
        New position after the edge meeting

      • getEdgeVelocity

        public double getEdgeVelocity(int edge)
        Get the current velocity for given edge
        Parameters:
        edge - Concerned edge (see static members)
        Returns:
        Velocity to apply on whatever goes through the edge

      • setEdges

        public void setEdges(int leftComportement,
            int bottomComportement,
            int rightComportement,
            int topComportement,
            int frontComportement,
            int backComportement)
        Set the edge comportement for each window's edge (use static members)
        Parameters:
        leftComportement - Comportement on window's left edge
        bottomComportement - Comportement on window's bottom edge
        rightComportement - Comportement on window's right edge
        topComportement - Comportement on window's top edge
